Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to all damage and effects on miss or successful save. Resistant to damage from non-attack spaces of area effects.

Traits.Name: Prowl
Traits.Description: Gains stealth at the start of their turn.

Traits.Name: Finishing Blow
Traits.Description: Boost damage if character is bloody.

Traits.Name: Nimble
Traits.Description: Has evasion unless suffering from a status.

Actions.Name: Stab
Actions.Hit: Deal light physical damage. Boost damage and gains pierce if the target has no allies adjacent.

Actions.Name: Lunge
Actions.Hit: Deal heavy physical damage. Trigger finishing blow if character is blinded or has no adjacent allies.
